title: [K-12] Teacher Technology Integration in Technology-Rich Classrooms: Mathematics Project-Based Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts comprehension and smart device utilization experience
context.additional_context: Emphasis on technology integration strategies for math problem-solving and project execution in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Technology tools suitable for math classes can be evaluated by analyzing elements of the Technology Acceptance Model (TAM).
Smartphone-based math learning activities can be designed by considering Technology-Task Fit (TTF).
Formative assessment tools can be used to measure the effectiveness of technology-integrated lessons and suggest improvements.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
